scripts.clean: find . -name '.next' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} \; && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} \; && find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf {} \; && echo 'Cleaned all build artifacts'
scripts.install:all: cd agent-service && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../frontend-cronos-sentinal && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install
